item.title: The Haunted Shootery Script
item.dc:creator: @script_owned script_owned
item.description:
@script_owned wrote:

you should organize it a lil and also make it into procedures, looks better.

if this is your first script then gj.

also you should never make it repeat itself forever.

always have a key or something to stop it, so in this 1 i made it stop it when you press f4.

[code]// Made by blasterr
program The_Haunted_Shootery;

const
   RIP=5987163; //Tombstone
   Face=16777062; //Face
   Ghost=144637; //Pet Ghost
   Boss=16776960; //Tree Boss
   Tree=4876424; //Tree
   Bird=1010855; //Bird

var
x, y :Integer;

procedure Shooting;
begin
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, RIP, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, Tree, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, Bird, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x , y, Face, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, Ghost, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, Boss, 50, 50 , 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
end;

begin
repeat
Shooting;
until(isfkeydown(4));
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: The Haunted Shootery Script
item.dc:creator: @blasterr blasterr
item.description:
@blasterr wrote:

It works ok for me although I wish I could get it to click faster.

[code]// Made by blasterr
program The_Haunted_Shootery;
const
RIP=5987163; //Tombstone
Face=16777062; //Face
Ghost=144637; //Pet Ghost
Boss=16776960; //Tree Boss
Tree=4876424; //Tree
Bird=1010855; //Bird
var
x, y :Integer;

begin
repeat;
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, RIP, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, Tree, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, Bird, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x , y, Face, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, Ghost, 50, 50, 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, Boss, 50, 50 , 600, 450) then
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
until(false)
end.[/code]
